text: The Young Europeans Literary Award started in 2008. Its goal is to promote European culture. The European Union National Institutes for Culture organises it. Each year 26 books are short listed, one book from each member of the European Union. ==Selected books for 2016== Country Author Book title Editor Translator 1\.
